Verses: 1 pinbu Karththaraagiya Aandavar Enakkuk Kaanbiththadhaavadhu: Idho, Pazhuththa Pazhangalulla Oru Koodai Irundhadhu.

2 avar: Aamose, Nee Ennaththaik Kaangiraai Endru Kettaar? Pazhuththa Pazhangalulla Oru Koodaiyaik Kaangiren Endren. Appozhudhu Karththar Ennai Nokki: En Janamaagiya Isravelukku Mudivukaalam Vandhadhu; Ini Avargalai Mannikkamaatten.
3 annaalile Dhevaalayappaattugal Alarudhalaaga Maarum; Ellaa Idaththilum Thiralaana Predhangal Pulambalillaamal Erindhuvidappadum Endru Karththaraagiyaaandavar Sollugiraar.

5 naangal Marakkaalaik Kuraiththu, Sekkal Niraiyai Adhigamaakki, Kallaththaraasinaal Vanjiththu, Dhariththiraraip Panaththukkum, Eliyavargalai Orujodu Paadharatchaikkum Kollumpadikkum, Dhaaniyaththin Padharai Virkumpadikkum,
6 naangal Thavasam Virkaththakkadhaaga Maadhappirappum, Naangal Dhaaniyaththin Pandasaalaigalaith Thirakkaththakkadhaaga Oivunaalum Eppodhu Mudiyum Endru Sollugiravargale, Idhaik Kelungal.
7 avargal Seygaigalaiyellaam Naan Orupodhum Marappadhillaiyendru Karththar Yaakkobudaiya Magimaiyinperil Aanaiyittaar.
8 idhinimiththam Dhesam Adhiravum, Adhin Kudigal Ellaam Dhukkikkavum, Engum Nadhigalaaip Purandodavum, Egipthin Aatruvellaththaippol Adiththu, Peruvellamaagavum Vendaamo?
9 annaalile Naan Maththiyaanaththile Sooriyanai Asthamikkappanni, Pattappagalile Dhesaththai Andhagaarappaduththi,

10 ungal Pandigaigalai Dhukkippaagavum, Ungal Paattugalaiyellaam Pulambalaagavum Maarappanni, Sagala Araigalilum Rattaiyum, Sagala Thalaigalilum Mottaiyaiyum Varuviththu, Avargaludaiya Dhukkippai Ore Pillaikkaaga Dhukkikkira Dhukkippukku Samaanamaakki, Avargaludaiya Mudivaik Kasappaana Naalaakkuven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

11 idho, Naan Dhesaththinmel Panjaththai Anuppum Naatkal Varum; Aagaarak Kuraivinaal Undaagiya Panjamalla, Jalakkuraivinaal Undaagiya Thaagamumalla,karththarudaiya Vasanam Ketkak Kidaiyaadha Panjaththai Anuppuven Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

12 appozhudhu Avargal Karththarudaiya Vasanaththaith Theda Oru Samuththiranthodangi Maru Samuththiramattum, Vadathisaithodangik Keezhththisaimattum Alaindhu Thirindhum Adhaik Kandadaiyaamar Povaargal.
13 annaalile Sowndhariyamulla Kannigaigalum Vaalibarum Thaagaththinaal Sorndhupovaargal.

14 thaane! Un Dhevanudaiya Jeevanaikkondum, Peyersebaa Maarkkaththin Dhevanudaiya Jeevanaikkondum Endru Solli, Samaariyaavin Thoshaththinmel Aanaiyidugiravargal Vizhuvaargal; Ini Orupodhum Ezhundhirukkamaattaargal Endraar.
